name: Codex of Victory
description: In this sci-fi turn-based strategy with real-time base-building elements, youâ€™ll be defending human territories against the transhuman Augments. Expand your HQ, and manufacture and upgrade an army of advanced drones to wage interplanetary war for Humanity!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Vista/7/8/8.1/10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 4600+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia / AMD / Intel (HD 3000 or better) with 512 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Vista/7/8/8.1/10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i5 3.20 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 805 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia / AMD / Intel (HD 3000 or better) with 1 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
